title: Create a Site-Specific Safety Plan
description: For a new project, a safety director must create a site-specific safety plan.

tasks.description: Generate a new safety plan using the company's standard template.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new plan is created with standard company safety policies.

tasks.description: Identify site-specific hazards, such as proximity to an active school, and add a section for managing this risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new section is added to the plan detailing procedures for working near the school.

tasks.description: Add contact information for the nearest hospital and local emergency services to the plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The emergency contact information in the plan is updated and verified.
